structure_sections.description: "İyi akşamlar sayın seyirciler" - The presenter introduces herself and the program, indicating the start of the news broadcast.

structure_sections.start_sentence: Hemen başlayalım şimdi azmettiricilik le suçlanan Dilan Engin ve Sezgin Polat
structure_sections.description: "Hemen başlayalım şimdi azmettiricilik le suçlanan Dilan Engin ve Sezgin Polat" - The main content of the broadcast begins, detailing the court case involving Dilan Engin and Sezgin Polat, along with various developments and reactions related to the case.

structure_sections.start_sentence: İşte o hakim bu duruşmada da görev aldı
